p.k: When young and pretty Poppy is hired as an au pair in a middle-class family, she did not think that her days and nights would be much busier than expected. Unlike many couples whose libido falls after a few years, Anissa and Kristof are always ready for new sexual experiences. The arrival of this innocent young woman even seems to give them ideas for new erotic games. Although quite inexperienced and shy Poppy is quickly seduced by the couple and decides to mix business with pleasure by participating in the antics of her new bosses and their close friends. This is a professional experience she is not ready to forget.
